sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DefaultRoleUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DefaultRoleUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DefaultRoleUtils = Class.create();
DefaultRoleUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getInternalRoleSysID: function() {
		var roleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
		roleGR.addQuery('name', 'snc_internal');
		roleGR.query();
		if (roleGR.next()) {
			return roleGR.sys_id;
		} else {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Unable to find the role 'snc_internal'."));
			return null;
		}	
	},

	type: 'DefaultRoleUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-08-14 20:55:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0507037e93310200288679b4f47ffbf5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DefaultRoleUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Explicit Roles" source="com.glide.explicit_roles">c32cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0507037e93310200288679b4f47ffbf5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-08-14 20:55:33</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
